For over three decades, MCS Digital has specialised in the design, delivery and support of mission critical radio communications equipment and systems in Australia. Our experience extends across a wide range of industry sectors including essential services, transport, oil and gas, petroleum, mining, public safety, emergency services, security and public events with expertise in high risk and hazardous environments.Since commencing operations in 1979, MCS Digital has gained considerable experience in delivering state of the art communications solutions and services for mission critical and hazardous environments on behalf of many large organisations including Viva Refining Australia (formerly Shell Refining), Rio Tintoâ€™s Pacific Aluminium Group (Australian and New Zealand), Origin Energy, the Australian Department of Defence (Thales), Australian Federal Police, Victorian Government, Tasmania Police and Victoria Country Fire Authority.Our experience qualifies us to work with you, alongside our Global Partners, to understand your requirements and challenges, so that we can provide the most appropriate technology and systems design that is optimised to provide you with a robust solution and the most efficient implementation and integration.MCS is proud to successfully deliver projects and ongoing support that provides our clients with first class customer care and assured satisfaction. Our network of Global Partners and a broad range of industry professionals including consultants, subcontractors and distributors ensures our leading edge in knowledge and innovation.

FunGuy StudioÂ® is a work for hire studio and developer of mobile applications, web applications and designer of business applications.The company is based in Makati Philippines and has a customer book of well know consumer brands, entertainment brands and B2B brands.The company is headed up by Darwin Tardio as COO.The primary value proposition of the company is "thoughtfully well designed applications developed in a timely fashion at a hugely competitive price"We have a marketing budget of $0 and we are busy with referrals and repeat business from our loyal customers.

March 17, 2016, Graeme was a client of Alexandreâ€™s

I have worked with Alex on multiple licenses in multiple genres and every deal has the same thing in common. Alex's attention to detail, efficiency and his outstanding representation of his clients. Alex goes out of his way to indentify opportunity and present it to us, he champions our cause with his clients where he see's it is in their commercial interest. The thing I have always appreciated is his no nonsense way of getting a deal done - quickly get a term sheet together with reasonably commercials and then he moves it through approval faster than most anyone else. So while all that sounds good for me, it is great for his clients. Alex makes licensing deals happen on a great foundation of mutual value.

Alfonzo 'Zo' Burton
Executive Creative Director @ UX MAGICIANS
September 21, 2015, Graeme was a client of Alfonzoâ€™s

Alfonzo (Zo) contacted us several months ago to introduce himself through LinkedIn. Curiously I clicked on the link he provided with his email which took me to his portfolio of work, and what a portfolio it is.Rarely to do you come across someone with the deep experience and incredible talent of Zo, and when  you do, you reach out and grab it with both hands and that is what we did.Zo became a consulting creative director on MotoGP - Championship Quest. This is a mobile game based on the pinnacle of motorcycle racing and our abilities to nail the look and feel of the UI had been stretched, we hoped Zo would be able to bring some magic to the game.His process of iteration, collaboration and inclusion were the panacea we had been looking for. He absolutely nailed it. He listened, he questioned and he pushed back where he felt we were off track. The result we think is some of the best work we will publish and Zo has left his stamp on another game which we hope will make it to the top charts.I could not recommend Zo more highly and I know we will be working with him again.If you are contemplating working with Zo, do yourself a favor and pull the trigger.

summary: Mobile media focused entrepreneur producing and publishing the first ever free to play mobile game for #MotoGP to be released on the Apple App Store, Google Play and Amazon App Store. As Co-founder of WePlay Media we we see our selves as an entertainment company with a focus on casual games based on major sports, Television programming, Movies and bringing this content as a free download to the app stores. We see WePlay Media as an innovator in the game industry with a tight focus on deeply embedding brands and advertising into our games so that we can successfully deliver profitable content to free to play gamers. Our current titles include MotoGP, Monster Trucks (Paramount), Steve Harvey Show (Edemol) and consumer product licenses such as Bubble Wrap.We are always looking for partnership opportunities and creative ways to deliver great content to our customers.
name: Graeme Warring
title: Co-Founder Weplay Media (MotoGP Mobile)
